reviewText: Bought it for my granddaughter. She watches it over and over. It is also educational.

My Grandson who is only 2 watches this and looks forward to it every night.  I got it for him for Christmas and my Daughter always had trouble with him when it was time to go home but now that she has that Movie, he is ready to put on his coat and go home.  I guess I rate second to a movie but is definitely worth hearing him sing the songs to the "Blues Clues".
My 2 year old grandson loves Blues Clues.  He would watch it for hours if we would let him.  He really likes the alphabet.
My 21 month old loves Blues Clues, but this particular video was too old for him. I'm sure he'll like it more later.
My daughter loves this DVD!  At age 2 she can already say her ABCs, recognize all the letters individually, and even write some small words.  This is a wonderful, educational DVD!
I purchased this for my kids and they LOVE it! They sing the songs and even perfected their ABCs... Great item for use both in the car or at home! Highly recommend this item!

This was our first Blue's Clues video for our three year old and she loves it. It's easy to follow and fun to watch. I even find myself singing the little songs they have in it. It's one of the few videos she has where she actually interacts with the program.

The version we have actually has two episodes and both are a little under 30 minutes.

For me, to have those on DVD, with Steve whom my 3 year old loves makes this DVD worth the price of admission.  While Joe is pretty good, Steve has a quality that makes preschoolers feel like he is talking just to them!  The ABC's episode is fantastic for a three and up, as a 2 year old, it went above his head, and what they asked them to understand was too much, but now, on DVD he loved it and was able to participate right along -- they need to recognize first letters of words maybe to truly appreciate it.  The 123s episode is wonderful, teaches counting, addition, subtraction, more, haven't even watched the Joe episodes in 3 viewings.
Great condition!
Quality was ok
Kids love it
Good for children
Bought for my little grandson.. he will be excited!
Thank you we love Blue!
good dvd
DVD received in good condition
My 2 year old loves watch this DVD. It is educational and fun to watch for her. She repeats a lot of what she sees on this show.
My son enjoys ALL the Blue's Clues dvd's! I enjoy them because they teach so many things; numbers, letters, kindness, feelings, getting along with people, different feelings....

My son is only 2 and loves Blue's Clues.  The stuff isn't easy to come by anymore and he is getting ready to start a new pre-school.  This is perfect to get him somewhat in the mindset of what to expect.
Easy way help children never been to school, going back to school, or even those already attending school what to expect.

I recommend this dvd for toddlers and preschoolers very much!  Who doesn't love blue's clues?  It covers all the basic fundamentals your child will need to know in regards to entering school.  I highly recommend this dvd!!  It kept my two grandchildren totally entertained.  My grandchildren are 10 months old and 4 years old.  I could see the expressions on both of their faces as they watched, happy, happy, happy.
My son is watching it every day, and asking questions about going to school. He is learning so much! Good choice.
My son just discovered Blue and is a great tool in teaching him things such as the alphabet and counting.
Love Blues Clues - but this one isn't one of my son's favorites.  We live both Steve and Joe because they each bring something different to the show.

This dvd is really a jewelry for my three years old son. He loves "Blues Clues" and we enjoy to see him playing with Blues and learning new things. This video came very fast so we say thanks to the seller!!!Blue Takes You to School
This has 4 episodes, 2 with Joe and 2 with Steve. My daughter, 2, loves them. Good value for the price.

I have a three year old who loves Blues Clues. He loves this DVD. It came very fast and he watches it over and over. It was inexpensive and got to my home in no time. I give this seller high ratings because the package was just as it was described.
My one year old daughter loves it and my son loved it when he was two! Plus, mom and dad think it's amusing too. :)
We love Blue.  I just wish there were more episodes on each disc.

Excellent fun, interactive learning tool!
Episodes are
Blue takes you to school (joe)
Numbers Everywhere (Joe)
Blues ABC's (Steve)
Math (Steve)

Blue has been around for some time. When my oldest who is 20 was small he loved blue and now my two year old does. The video is very educational as well as fun for the child. The concepts in the movie help teach small children and make learning fun for them. Great video I would recommend for toddlers.
My young grandson loves Blue's Clues! A learning experience.

Blues Clues came out when my girls were little and became one of their favorites. Now I have a grandson who is two and it has become a favorite again. He does not tune into much when it comes to the t.v. at this age. But as soon as he hears the music he comes a running. I'm not sure what it is but I think it has to do with Steve and interacting with them through the television. It's like he is talking directly to them. At his age I am so amazed at how much he has learned just by watching. These days there is so many shows for young children thanks to Nick jr. But I have to admit there is only a handful of them that have been able to achieve that same level of interaction. We still love Steve from the original shows the best. Joe is OK but he was not quite the same. For what ever reason even my grandson at 2, likes the Steve episodes the best.
Great educational fun video.
Great Purchase
any kindergarten child will love this dvd.  one of the best.
So happy and satisfied.. My 18mo old son enjoyed watching it!
Loved tape and fast delivery.
